canteen_description: JC is a common name used to refer to ‘Juice Canteen’ and other canteens around it - ‘Tantra’, ‘David’s bakery’, and ‘Rolls and Frankies’
VC - Vindya Canteen, as the name suggests, is located near the Vindhya block. Here you will find a maggi stall, a dosa counter and even a juice stall!
BBC, short for Basketball Canteen, mostly serves variations in dosas and maggi
Located in the CIE block of Vindya, hence the name.
